extendedInfo.description: K-LOVE plays Positive, Encouraging music featuring artists like Chris Tomlin, Third Day, and TobyMac. K-LOVE is a not-for-profit, listener supported radio station dedicated to sharing the hope of Jesus through great music.For Use on Android Smart Phones only.

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Works great for me. It is fantastic to have K love in my pocket and there to help me at anytime to stay centered on Jesus . Yea - God!
reviews.author: Johnny McMichael

reviews.title: Actually 0 stars
reviews.comment: Crashes upon opening.   Freezes display. Tried several times on my Galaxy Note 2 phone.
reviews.author: Tig Ger

reviews.title: Love this station!
reviews.comment: They keep improving their app.  Really appreciate their efforts! !   -Nashville, TN
reviews.author: Laura King

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.comment: I downloaded it & it will not work for nothing & keeps  freezing. I hope they fix it so I can continue listening to my fave music!
reviews.author: Victorica Oakes

reviews.comment: There\'s a bad delay when playing music when pushing start...keeps \"forced close\"
reviews.author: Amanda Schrei

reviews.title: I love Klove!
reviews.comment: You guys rock!  App works on my Galaxy Note 2.  Could use a LARGE play/stop button and I can\'t see where in settings to select hi lo bandwidth as advertised??
reviews.author: Fred Johnston

reviews.title: Empowering
reviews.comment: The radio station is truely a blessing. It is so uplifting and it speaks to my soul. Jesus is our Savior and we need to continue to sing songs of praise and worship, letting him know that we love him and are following. When I seen this app I know I should get ir so I xould continue to worship the Great I AM LORD OF LORDS KINF OF KINGS THE ALPHA THE OMEGA THE BEGINNING AND THE END
reviews.author: Amber Mangino

reviews.title: Radio station is great but the app it horrible
reviews.comment: 1. Can not search for songs or lyrics  2. The app drops off and stops playing. More often than not you can not get any music at all to play
reviews.author: Lori Holden

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Awesome app. I\'m stationed overseas and still get to hear K-Love! Thank God!
reviews.author: Brian Simmons

reviews.title: Barely works
reviews.comment: The majority of he time cannot get music to play and when it does play i only get to listen to about 2 songs before it stops working i would love for it to be fixed and usable again please make it better i really like k-love.
reviews.author: Josh Rhiner

reviews.title: Never works
reviews.comment: I have a Droid Bionic and I can\'t ever use this app.  It always freezes up and shuts down.  I thought maybe I needed an update.  Nope, no update available.  Really bummed it doesnt work.
reviews.author: Kristen Sutton

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: Amazing app and love k love! Keep doing great things for God! I listen to K Love ALL the time.
reviews.author: Todd Richey

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Perfect scripture when you need and great music!
reviews.author: Juan Aparicio

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I luv klove and it works perfectly i found out a few tricks to make itt play the music faster so iysca perfect app for me
reviews.author: Rachel Bagley

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I\'m from El Paso Texas and I found this radio station there. But I moved to San Diego a year ago and there was no k-love here so I recently found this app and I feel in love with it. Now I can take my music where ever. I love this app But I do gotta say it does freezes a lot and suddenly stops. But other than that I\'m in love with it  Thanks guys
reviews.author: Ascary Camarillo

reviews.title: God is always good.
reviews.comment: Love app.
reviews.author: Justin Beydoun

reviews.title: Heart String Melodies
reviews.comment: Thank you for this much needed vessel for our Lord work!\342\231\245\342\231\241:-) :
reviews.author: Tamra Sanchez

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app great station!
reviews.author: David G

reviews.title: The Best radio station ever
reviews.comment: Thank you for playing all the best of Christian music. Perfect with morning daily prayer.
reviews.author: Rose Neri

reviews.title: Klove
reviews.comment: This is inspiring to me.
reviews.author: Alma KLein
